# attn Docs

> Canonical documentation for attnCredit: onchain revenue-backed credit lines with non-custodial controls, routing lock, and automated repayment flows.

## Start here
- [Overview](https://docs.attn.markets/): Documentation home.
- [attn 1-pager](https://docs.attn.markets/1-pager): Short product summary.
- [How it works (non-technical)](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/how-it-works-nontechnical): End-to-end user flow.
- [Architecture overview](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/architecture-overview): System architecture and components.

## Core mechanics
- [Revenue accounts and signing model](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/revenue-accounts-and-signing-model): Control model and signing boundaries.
- [Risk and limits](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/risk-and-limits): Underwriting controls and limit logic.
- [Pricing and parameters](https://docs.attn.markets/mechanics/pricing-and-parameters): Pricing and configurable terms.

## User guides
- [For creators, devs, and CTOs](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-creators-devs-and-ctos)
- [For apps, DAOs, and builders](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-apps-daos-and-builders)
- [For launchpads and incubators](https://docs.attn.markets/users/for-launchpads-and-incubators)

## Optional
- [Roadmap](https://docs.attn.markets/roadmap)
- [Tokenomics overview](https://docs.attn.markets/tokenomics/tokenomics-overview)
- [Main site](https://www.attn.markets/)
- [App demo](https://app.attn.markets/credit-line)
